name: Surf It
description:
Surf-It is a skill based racing game with surfing and bhopping mechanics, known from games like Counter Strike and Quake. At the moment it is still in development and will be expanded in the future.

I will post updates to the project on my YouTube channel "Make Game Repeate": https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSb2TH-hO57XfBmG14FFC9A

Features planned for the future:

  • Local or Online Multiplayer
  • Level Editor
  • Many more Levels

I will also read every single comment on YouTube and Itch.io, so maybe you have a great idea what I could add to the game. 

The Music I use in the game is royalty free and comes from Upbeat (free for Creators!). Thank you to all the creators, that provide such great musik for free:
